column2: "Oh, it's you, Leader. Strange? What do you mean? What's so strange about our being here?"
"See! I told you! If we wait here, Leader is sure to show up!"
"Huh? You want to know why we're standing here?"

"Seraphy gave us a mission. To be precise...
Our mission is to assist you, Master."
"...Hmm, that's right. Leader, if you have any free time, could you speak to me?"
"You seem to be busy today. Standing here, we've had a good view of your activities."

"Running around all over the place on missions, taking on requests from your fellow ARKS...
You truly are a good person."
"You go wherever you're needed and do whatever you must, regardless of whether you're seen doing it or not. I suppose... I can appreciate that attitude, just a little."
"I've heard a lot of rumors about you around here."
"I was surprised to hear you had a side like that to you. Not in a bad way, though. You're quite an interesting person, you know."
"Am I ready to deploy at any time? Heheh... But of course. I exist in a constant state of preparedness."
"If you're not ready... I can wait. The success or failure of any operation depends on how well you prepare. If you call yourself a professional, don't neglect your preparations."

"I thought that I alone would have been sufficient for this mission...
But I now see the value of having a team behind you."
"Hehe... It took me a little by surprise. The way everyone's individual quirks lead to unpredictable behaviour. But it wasn't too bad, in the end."

"Because you were there, I was able to befriend the others.
...I am grateful to you, Leader."

"I've never really talked to other people before...
Aside from on missions, that is."

"It feels good to have friends.
Leader... Thank you. Hehe... I hope you'll be able to continue helping me."
"PSO2es"

"For a limited time, popular Weaponoids from PSO2es such as Ignis are appearing in PSO2!

PSO2es is a game you can play on your smartphone. You can experience exciting action with simple touch-swipe controls.

Do battle against mighty enemies with Weaponoids, partners based on familiar weapons from PSO2, at your side! In story mode, experience an epic story in the PSO2 universe, alongside Gene, More and the Darker Busters team, plus new friends like Akhtar, Lien and the Weaponoids!"

"PSO2 and PSO2es can be linked to share data. By linking the two games, you can play PSO2es with your PSO2 characters. PSO2es lets you enjoy play PSO2es anytime, anywhere, and improves your efficiency in PSO2 by letting you level up characters on the go, and acquire PSO2es-exclusive items.

If you're interested, download it now! Play PSO2es, and enter a whole new world where you can get to know characters like Kazami-no-tachi, Elder Pain, Optreion, Saika Hyouri and so many more! A new adventure awaits you!!"
